structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 223, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 230, sec. 29, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 522, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.
